# sizeConstraint

**Instance Property**

Additional sizes this image feature supports.

## Declaration

```swift
var sizeConstraint: MLImageSizeConstraint { get }
```

## Inspecting acceptable sizes

- **MLImageSizeConstraint**: A list or range of sizes that augment an image constraint’s default size.

items.description: A list or range of sizes that augment an image constraint’s default size.
